price: 30. afin qu’(Allah) leur attribue leur pleine récompense et leur ajoute de Ses faveurs. Il est Absoluteur et si Reconnaissant ![423]
arabic: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ
footnotes: [423] Voir la note 417 concernant le verset 15 de la sourate Saba’.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: liyuwaffiyahum ujūrahum wayazīdahum min faḍlihi innahu ghafūrun shakūrun
translations: That He may give them in full
